expanded_text: {name} {emoji} National: {national} {typee_str}: {typee} {ab_str}: {ability} {evo_text} Games data Gender: {gender} Base friendship: {base_friendship} EV yield: {ev_yield} Catch rate: {catch_rate} Growth rate: {growth_rate} Egg groups: {egg_group} Egg cycles: {egg_cycles} About Pokémon Species: {species} Height: {height} Weight: {weight} Name origin: {name_origin} Other lang: {other_lang} Base stats: {base_stats}{legend}
start_message:
⚡️ Hey There, I'm BOT DEVLOPED FOR HEXA 482 BY @pranavjha1 🥳
My trainer merged me with a Telegram Bot. He's teaching me some commands, for now I learned these:

/start : you have just used it 🙃 
/data Pokemon Name : Get info about a particular Pokémon 
/usage: Get current VGC usage on Pokémon Showdown 
/types: Info about different Pokémon types 
/ptype: Get to know the type of a particular Pokémon 
/type: Get info about a particular type 
/faq: FAQ ❓ 
/about: Informations about me 🤩
error1: ⚡️ Ooops! My trainer's teaching me many things, but I still can't read in thought. Use this syntax: /data pokemonname ex.: /data Rotom
results: I traveled to 8 regions with my trainer but I have never heard of such a Pokémon 🧐 However, I can find the 3 closest Pokémon to what you told me Here are the results ⚡️
about: ⚡️ Oh Hi! I'm Rotom-2.0, developed by @Warning_MadBoy_is_Here. Do you want some more info? Well, I'll give you some interesting links ⬇️ 🌐 GitHub I'm open-source! https://github.com/madboy482/rotom-2.0 I'm open-source! https://github.com/alessiocelentano/rotomgram 🙏 Credits @alessiocelentano (bot, data organization, logo) @gianlucatarantino (additional data) pokemondb.net (data) smogon.com (VGC usage) pokemon.com (artworks) @pranavjha1 (Bot Developer)
limit: ⚡️⚡️😵⚡️😵 Ooooof 😵⚡️⚡️😵⚡️ Oh Arceus, do you want to drive me crazy? Well don't do it anymore, there are no Pokémon with more than 25 characters in the name
nomatch: Write in a language understandable to humans (and Pokémons)
not_admin: You cannot use this command because you are not an admin
added:
⚡️ Oh, Hey There! Thanks for adding me, I'm Rotom-2.0, developed by @Warning_MadBoy_is_Here. My trainer merged me with a Telegram Bot, so I can give you a lot of informations about the Pokemon world! These are my commands: 
 
/start: Command list 
/data PokemonName: Get information about that Pokémon 
/usage: Get current VGC usage on Pokémon Showdown 
/types: Info about different Pokémon types 
/ptype: Get to know the type of a particular Pokémon 
/faq: FAQ ❓ 
/about: Informations about me 🤩
faq: ❓ FAQ Q: What is Rotom-2.0? A: Rotom-2.0 is a actually a bot developed by @pranavjha1 on basis of @RotomgramBot, which acts as a helper for trainers on Telegram. You can check information of Pokémon, Showdown usage and check effectiveness; weakness of Pokémon types as quickly as possible, without ever leaving the app Q: How to get Pokemon informations? A: Just write Pokemon name after /data command (e.g.: /data Rotom) Q: How can I help? A: You can help me in several ways: - Pull Request/Issue on Rotomgram GitHub Repository page - Report me tips/bugs in private (@pranavjha1)
